item.title: US-189 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-189 south. Distance to Orem and Provo.

item.title: US-189 South/US-40 East at US-189/US-40 Split
item.description: US-189 South/US-40 East at US-189/US-40 split in Heber City.

item.title: US-40 East/US-189 South at US-40/US-189 Split
item.description: US-40 East/US-189 South at US-40/US-189 split in Heber City. Turn right to continue south on US-189 to Provo and Orem; merge left to stay on US-40 East to Duchesne.
